Introduction

Hi! Welcome to my portfolio page. This is based off the content for Project 2 of the Udacity Fullstack Web Development Nanodegree. It was constructed using the Bootstrap and jQuery frameworks.

You can view the whole project on GitHub at Udacity Portfolio Website. It also uses component from the Web Tooling and Automation Course on Udacity.
